start.text: Kartik: Bhaiyo! Aaj project submission hai! Bhumika Mam ki aankh se kuch nahi bach sakta!
options: Raj: Jaldi shortcut se chalte hain!
Tanmay: Chill karo bro, seedha lab chalte hain.

shortcut.text: Roshan: Yeh kya bhai?! Ye toh Mechanical workshop hai, Chemical ka lab kahan gaya?

askperson.text: Viraj: Uncle bol rahe hain ki peeche se right lena tha... wapas chalo!

tanmay.text: Tanmay: Arey bhai maine kab bola ki yeh shortcut hai? üòÖ
options: Kya yeh sab meri galti hai?

openmap.text: Raj: Google Maps kholne gaya tha, par WiFi nahi chal raha üòë
options: Kartik: Ab toh bas andhadhundh bhaag lo!
Raj: Mam ko phone kar doon kya?

panic.text: Viraj: Tune agar mam ko call kiya toh attendance gayi samajh!

corridor.text: Kartik: Yeh raha corridor! Mam samne aa gayi! ü´£
options: Roshan: Ek kaam karte hain, mam se pehle lab mein ghus jaate hain
Tanmay: Chup chap project de dete hain

sneak.text: Raj: Bhai mam ke peechhe se niklenge toh bach jaayenge!

hide.text: Viraj: Bhaiyo successful operation! Mam ne dekha hi nahi! üí®üí®
options: Selfie le lo yeh moment ki!

selfie.text: Kartik: Selfie lete waqt flash on tha... Mam ne dekh liya! üò≠

caught.text: Bhumika Mam: Kya ho raha hai yeh sab? Attendance cancel + Viva leke jaaungi!

lab.text: Kartik: Finally! Project desk mil gaya!

coffee.text: Tanmay: Pehle coffee, baad mein submission... kya galat ho sakta hai?

submit.text: Bhumika Mam: Good work team. Kartik, sab ka naam likhwao. Full marks. ‚úîÔ∏è
